title: Hanes Men's Ultimate Full-Zip Hoodie, Men's Hooded Fleece Sweatshirt with Zipper
description: A HEAVYWEIGHT CHAMPION - Hanes sweatshirts for men are made from soft, plush, 9.7-oz. heavyweight fleece for cozy warmth.
HOODED - Jersey-lined hood with drawcord helps block out wind and chill.
ZIP-FRONT - This comfortable sweatshirt for men features a front zip closure for easy on-and-off.
QUALITY FABRIC - The heavyweight cotton-rich fleece is made with Hanes' patented anti-pill technique and features a high-density stitch count.
POUCH POCKET - A roomy split-pouch pocket provides the perfect storage place for small essentials in these Hanes sweatshirts
COLD WATER WASH - Machine wash cold with like colors. Use only nonchlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Cool iron if needed.

Featuring our heaviest fleece, the Hanes Ultimate® full-zip hoodie keeps you warm and cozy. Crafted from a cotton-rich 9.7-oz. fleece that maintains its softness, this versatile men’s zip-up hoodie sweatshirt is an easy-on, easy-off wardrobe essential. Layer over your favorite tee and pair it with sweats or jeans for casual, yet cool style. Nothing beats the convenience of a full-zip jacket that is also a hooded sweatshirt. You'll like the ribbed cuffs with relaxed waistband and appreciate the patented low-pill, high-stitch density fabric. A split kanga pocket warms your hands or stores essentials while the roomy hood and drawcord cut the wind.
